text: Today was the first time he heard her words with pleasure, and slowly, without speaking, lifted his hat.

passages.full_quote: This <used>was the first time he</used> had taken his leg from the chair

passages.fragment: the first time he heard her words with pleasure , and
passages.full_quote: Now for <used>the first time he heard her words with pleasure, and</used> did not inwardly oppose them

passages.fragment: with pleasure , and slowly , without speaking ,
passages.full_quote: Kitty blushed <used>with pleasure, and slowly, without speaking, s</used>queezed her new friend's hand, which did not respond to her pressure, but lay motionless in her hand
Probably on Oblonsky's pointing them out, he looked round in the direction where the Princess and Sergei Ivanovich were standing, and, <used>without speaking, lifted his hat</used>
